Very cool ambiance. Not so cool staff. Besides that I ordered a vegetable stir fry with chicken and noodles and they forgot the noodles, the food was quite good. I had to ask the waiter where the noodles were because I clearly couldn't see them under that pile of vegetables and after telling me that he had forgotten to put the noodles in my plate he brought another plate with near a ton of rice noodles, so yes I accepted that as an apologize.
